description: Stretch one arm with the palm facing forward and pull your fingers up for 10 seconds by hand.
Stretch your arm against your chest and pull it using your other arm for 10 seconds per arm.
Pull your neck with the help of the hand to the right and the left, remaining in the position for a few seconds.
With both hands on the back of your head, take it down along the back of the area.
Cross your legs and go down with hands stretched toward the floor. Repeat the movement with the other leg in front.
Sitting, open your legs and try to touch your palms on the floor, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull your knee against your chest and hold, switch legs for 10 seconds.
Sitting, cross one leg and lean your torso forward, switch your legs after 10 seconds.
Sitting, close your eyes and cover them with your palms for 2 minutes, then open normally.
In an open space, look as far as you can for 3s, just move your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area below the eyebrows in a circular motion for 15 seconds.
Standing, rotate your waist as far as you can to the left, hold for five seconds. Repeat to the right.
